title: On an inverse problem with applications in cardiac electrophysiology
authors:
Andrea Aspri, Elena Beretta, Elisa Francini, Dario Pierotti, Sergio
  Vessella
abstract:
In this paper, we consider the monodomain model of cardiac electrophysiology.
After an analysis of the well-posedness of the forward problem, we show that
perfectly insulating regions (modeling ischemic regions in the cardiac tissue)
can be uniquely determined by partial boundary measurements of the potential.
